msg: More TUSCANY-2858 work on bringing up the webapp support. Separate out the runtime initilization into a helper class so the common code can be shared, add a TuscanyContextListener that can start the Tuscany runtime, clean up the use of ThreadLocals. Just need to fix TUSCANY-2881 now
